title: [Rough Path, Canyon Wall]
description: The path doesn't end so much as fade away.  The canyon wall towers overhead, hundreds of feet high.  A jumble of boulders lies at the base of the wall.  A few scraggly plants struggle to survive in the stony soil, and a lizard of some sort sits on a rock, basking in the sun.

The path doesn't end so much as fade away.  The canyon wall towers overhead, hundreds of feet high.  A jumble of boulders lies at the base of the wall.  A few scraggly plants struggle to survive in the stony soil, and a lizard of some sort sits on a rock, basking in the moonlight.
